posts.post_title: FS  1887 Old Judge Cabinet  Ganzel  N173 $750
posts.post_content: For Sale   N173 1887 Old Judge Cabinet  (bottom trimmed)   Check Scans---I just purchased this card---I checked with a few Old Judge experts and even though trimmed, still a nice card.    thanks,  Don---I will reduce the price to $750 or best offer
